c74object.name: mb.amrmsynth~
c74object.digest: Generates timbres through ring and amplitude modulation

method.name: midi-note
method.digest: Lists starting with a number trigger a new midi event

method.name: modMode
method.digest: Sets the mode to ring or amplitude modulation

method.name: modDepth
method.digest: Sets the amound of modulation from 0 to 1

method.name: sidebandSt
method.digest: Sets the distance of the sidebands in semitones

method.name: modRation
method.digest: Sets the distance of the sidebands using a ratio to the base frequency

method.name: adsr
method.digest:
Sets the parameters of the internal live.adsr~ with a list of attack decay sustain release inital peak final attack-slope decay-slope release-slope.
You do not need to use all of the arguments for this message.
